thread.title: Yolanda Hadid, mother of Gigi and Bella, lands 'Model Moms' reality show
thread.title_full: Yolanda Hadid, mother of Gigi and Bella, lands 'Model Moms' reality show

author: USA TODAY
title: Yolanda Hadid, mother of Gigi and Bella, lands 'Model Moms' reality show
text:
Yolanda Hadid, mother of Gigi and Bella, lands 'Model Moms' reality show Carly Mallenbaum , USA TODAY 5:04   27 Shares 
Bella Hadid and Gigi Hadid kiss their mother, Yolanda Hadid, who's going to star in a new reality series. (Photo: PATRICK KOVARIK, AFP/Getty Images) 
Want to be the next Gigi or Bella Hadid? Lifetime had a feeling. 
The network just picked up the reality series Model Moms (working title), hosted by the former Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star (and Gigi, Bella and Anwar's mom) Yolanda Hadid, who wants to discover new talent for the catwalk. 
On the show, Mrs. Hadid will coach aspiring models and their "momagers" in an eight-week training program, "focused on the physical, mental and emotional wellness that it takes to build a sustainable brand," according to a release. 
"With a $5,000 weekly prize on the line to put towards their future careers, only one girl will be left standing to win a management contract with Yolandaâ€™s company and the potential opportunity to be represented by IMG Models in New York." 
Time to start practicing your strut. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2nya7A8 Most Popular
